item.title: Dashboard: mtcars Dataset
item.description: Column Fuel Efficiency dotplot <- ggplot(dat) + geom_segment(aes(x = mpg, y = cars, xend = 0, yend = cars)) + geom_point(aes(mpg, cars), size = 4, color = "#2780e3") + scale_x_continuous(name = "Miles Per Gallon", limits = c(0, 35), expand = c(0, 0)) + labs(y = "") + theme_classic() + theme(axis.line.y = element_blank(), axis.ticks.y = element_blank()) ggplotly(dotplot) {"x":{"data":[{"x":[21,0,null,21,0,null,22.8,0,null,21.4,0,null,18.7,0,null,18.1,0,null,14.3,0,null,24.4,0,null,22.8,0,null,19.2,0,null,17.8,0,null,16.4,0,null,17.3,0,null,15.2,0,null,10.4,0,null,10.4,0,null,14.7,0,null,32.4,0,null,30.4,0,null,33.9,0,null,21.5,0,null,15.5,0,null,15.2,0,null,13.3,0,null,19.2,0,null,27.3,0,null,26,0,null,30.4,0,null,15.8,0,null,19.7,0,null,15,0,null,21.4,0],"y":[19,19,null,20,20,null,24,24,null,21,21,null,15,15,null,14,14,null,4,4,null,26,26,null,25,25,null,16,16,null,13,13,null,11,11,null,12,12,null,8,8,null,1,1,null,2,2,null,5,5,null,31,31,null,29,29,null,32,32,null,23,23,null,9,9,null,7,7,null,3,3,null,17,17,null,28,28,null,27,27,null,30,30,null,10,10,null,18,18,null,6,6,null,22,22],"text":["mpg: 21.0 cars: Mazda RX4 xend: 0
